description:
wanted rotating wallpaper of my pictures. installed it. configured it with my picture folder. pop-up said i needed to log out for it to take effect. did so. nothing. original picture wasn't on the background. no background. looked at the configuration screen. it showed default values, not my folder.

went back to the ubuntu software. clicked on the Remove button. "Unable to remove "Budgie Wallstreet": no package to remove
may have to wipe my drive & start over.
summary: does nothing. does not work. might be malicious! don't even look

description: Works for paths that contain only ASCII symbols, but shows nothing if there is any non-ASCII symbol in the path.
Does not save my preferences. Seems like it won´t use my saved wallpapers at all and always changes back to standard wallpapers.
Начало хорошее. Но не хватает функционала Windows, чтобы картинки вписывались в экран, например.
